title: lagging and geting reported
body: i was playing atfer few minutes i was lagging really hard i said to my team that i am lagging and i exit the game for 2 or 3 minutes when i got back to the game we lost atfer the game i got the LOW PRIORITY QUEUE for be AFK i was like wow omg i got reported for my lagging. and people just report anyone who is not playing the game and they dont care about who is lagging cuz they just want to win a game that why i dont play league of much people are just... i dont even know now.

replies.body: It's a bummer to hear that a connection problem caused a leave and a penalty along with it.  The lower priority queue is marked by the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system, which happens after a history of leaves and not just game and regardless of your intent.  Your best bet would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get through your games.  Consistency is key!  Let me know if you have any questions.
